p: Glutathione (GSH), 1,1,3,3-Tetramethoxypropane (TMP), thiobarbituric acid (TBA), 5,5â€²-Dithiobis(2-nitrobenzoic acid), (3-(4,5-Dimethylthiazolyl-2)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide) (MTT), and 1,10-Phenanthroline were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). All the reagents were of analytical grade.
